IP.Name: RESMGR_UTILITY
IP.About: RESMGR_UTILITY (Resource Manager) : Software utility to manage the resources between cores

RefParameter.Name: RESMGR_UTILITY_Version
RefParameter.Comment: RESMGR_UTILITY version

RefParameter.Name: RESMGR_UTILITY_SendFunct
RefParameter.Comment: initialisation function of RESMGR

RefParameter.Name: RESMGR_UTILITY_Callback

RefParameter.Name: RESMGR_UTILITY_Void

RefParameter.Name: RESMGR_UTILITY_DynamicSystemResourcesUpdate
